rooms.name: Dark room
rooms.description: You are in a dark room. There is a door to the north.

rooms.name: Forest
rooms.description:
You are in the forest. There is a lot of light. There 
is a bear sleeping and you see a path to the east.

rooms.name: Forest path
rooms.description: You are on a beaten forest path that continues to east.

rooms.name: Mountain
rooms.description:
You get to a huge mountain. If you keep going north you can 
climb it.
